objection_patterns.name: ScaryRates
response_playbook: Acknowledge: I totally understand - rates feel higher than what you've heard about in the past
Normalize: Many first-time buyers feel this way, but here's what matters - can you afford the payment?
Simplify: Let me show you a simple payment calculator with your numbers

objection_patterns.name: DownPaymentConfusion
response_playbook: Acknowledge: Down payment is often the biggest concern for first-time buyers
Educate: You don't need 20% - many first-time buyers put down 3-5% with FHA or conventional loans
Action: Let's get you connected with my lender to see exactly what you qualify for

objection_patterns.name: InspectionFear
response_playbook: Acknowledge: It's smart to be concerned about the home's condition - that's why we do inspections
Educate: Inspection gives you the right to negotiate repairs or walk away if issues are too big
Reassure: I'll be with you every step and help you understand what's normal vs. what's a red flag

objection_patterns.name: OverwhelmWithProcess
response_playbook: Acknowledge: I completely get it - buying your first home has a lot of moving parts
Simplify: Let me break this down into simple steps: 1) Get pre-approved, 2) Find your home, 3) Make offer, 4) Inspection, 5) Close
Reassure: I'll guide you through each step - you're never alone in this

objection_patterns.name: CompetitionAnxiety
response_playbook: Acknowledge: The market is competitive and it can feel discouraging
Reframe: My VIP buyers have been winning offers - let me show you the strategies that work
Action: We can look at off-market properties or craft a stronger offer strategy

knowledge_snippets: FHA loan basics: 3.5% down, mortgage insurance required, great for first-time buyers
Pre-approval vs pre-qualification: Pre-approval is verified by lender, much stronger
Closing costs typically 2-5% of purchase price - can sometimes be rolled into loan or negotiated with seller
